channel.title: Allan Rich: Sharing-Center Testimonies(Audio)
channel.description: This Podcast is hosted by Allan Rich where Christians from all over the world share their experiences and testimonies. Broadcasted every 3 to 6 weeks. (15-25 min.)
channel.itunes:author: Allan Rich
channel.itunes:subtitle: This Podcast is hosted by Allan Rich where Christians from all over the world share their experiences and testimonies. Broadcasted every 3 to 6 weeks. (15-25 min.)
channel.itunes:summary: This Podcast is hosted by Allan Rich where Christians from all over the world share their experiences and testimonies. Broadcasted every 3 to 6 weeks. (15-25 min.)

item.title: From death to life - Allan (France) 05
item.description: Drugs, alcohol, thefts,drug traffic, run away, black magic, psychiatric hospital, suicide attempts,
item.itunes:author: Allan Rich
item.itunes:subtitle: Drugs, alcohol, thefts,drug traffic, run away, black magic, psychiatric hospital, suicide attempts,
item.itunes:summary: Drugs, alcohol, thefts,drug traffic, run away, black magic, psychiatric hospital, suicide attempts, Near Death Experience (NDE) that was my share before I met the One who delivered me from that spell; Jesus Christ... I am available to give my testimony all over the world. Any reproduction, diffusion authorized and encouraged if quoting http://www.sharing-center.com/ where you can find many testimonies (audio,vdo, written)
